introduction: CONTENTS:Program 1:- Secondo il mio occhio di vetro (1972 / 16mm / B/W / Sound / 10 min)- Del tuffarsi e dell’annegarsi (1972 / 16mm / B/W / Silent / 10 min)- L’operatore perforato (1979 / 16mm / B/W / Silent / 9 min)- Piccolo film decomposto (1986 / 16mm / B/W / Silent / 17 min)- Quando l’occhio trema (1989 / 16mm / B/W / Silent / 11 min)- Hilarisdoppio (1972 / 16mm / B/W / Sound / 19 min)- Film stenopeico (l’uomo senza macchina da presa) (1973-81-89 / 16mm / Color / Silent / 13 min)- Traumatografo (1973 / 16mm / B/W / Sound / 26 min)Program 2:- Immagini travolte dalla ruota di Duchamp (1994 / 16mm / B/W / Silent / 13 min)- Immagini disturbate da un intenso parassita (1970 / 16mm / B/W / Sound / 38 min)- Volto telato (2002 / video / B/W / Sound / 3 min)- Filmarilyn (1992 / 16mm / B/W / Silent or Sound / 9 min)- Commutazioni con mutazione (1969 / 16mm / B/W / Silent or Sound / 7 min)- Filmfinish (1986-89 / 16mm / B/W / Silent or Sound / 12 min)Extra Feature:Interview with Paolo Gioli (italian with optional english subtitles)
